title: Error....????
body:
Patcher problem .
After downloading 33% , as soon as files start scanning : Error , update failed .......

It's not a connection problem

I have reinstall LoL from beginning 3 times and still doesn't work 

I have disabled  UAC , checking the  disk for corrupted , running in admin mode ,my firewall is off , and none helped !!!
Any suggestions?

replies.body:
I understand you don't believe this is a connection issue, however, almost all issues that happen after 33% in patching are caused by a problem connecting to the server. This is because at 33% your patcher begins to connect to the patching service and downloading the new patch files, previous to that it's only scanning current files and figuring out where the new files will go. I definitely recommend working through all the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything is squared away there. 

Let me know if you still have issues after completing those steps.
